281c3e9e-1a16-4fd9-b163-3c1d19e0d56e.name: 战斗反射
281c3e9e-1a16-4fd9-b163-3c1d19e0d56e.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

e06f2c7b-37f7-4813-b7c5-29d625c049c1.name: 健康
e06f2c7b-37f7-4813-b7c5-29d625c049c1.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

50c0312d-152e-49e0-af7b-a845a516b2fc.name: Fit, Very
50c0312d-152e-49e0-af7b-a845a516b2fc.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

f072551d-5d10-4081-8d53-562abf1733f2.name: 高痛阈
